Game.Name: Keitai Denjuu Telefang 2 - Speed (Japan)
Game.plot: Keitai Denjuu Telefang 2 Power Limited is a Role-Playing game, developed by Smilesoft and published by Natsume,which was released in Japan in 2002.Cheat: Secret DenjuuOn the D-Phone menu there is an option called free call (the black phone icon) that allows you to call secret denjuu that are not available during normal gameplay. To call a secret denjuu, open the D-Phone menu, choose the black phone icon, then enter the phone number of the denjuu you would like to call.
